channel.title: Aromatic – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: Hydrogen
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A cold, crisp blend of mints and menthol.
item.content:encoded: An invigorating blend of mints and menthol designed to tickle the lungs of chill seekers. It is customary to give this blend the cold shoulder.

item.title: Aurora
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A fragrant mixture of cinnamon, spices, and crisp apples infused with subdued citrus undertones.
item.content:encoded: A mulled apple cider mix of green and red delicous apples infused with cinnamon and clove. To finish, we add a twist of orange zest. On the inhale, you’re greeted with the pleasant scent and flavor of the cinnamon and clove. As you exhale, you will get the fermented apples and tangy orange zest. This blend is a complex, full-bodied experience that is sure to keep your senses preoccupied.

item.title: Synergy
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of peach infused, American long-leaf tobaccos.
item.content:encoded: This blend was inspired by a trip down to Dixie. Synergy is a celebrated blend of peach infused tobaccos. On the front end, you’ll pick up on the sweet and nutty taste of Kentucky tobacco. On the finish, you’ll breathe in the smooth flavor and aroma of Georgia peaches.

item.title: Virgo
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A refreshing pink lemonade with notes of cactus and strawberry.
item.content:encoded: Virgo is a freckled pink-lemonade defined by charming tones of ripe strawberry. The blend is topped off with a juicy cactus garnish for a finish that is as delectable as the start.

item.title: Cicero
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A fragrant floral blend with prominent citrus notes.
item.content:encoded: Inspired by our other popular floral blend, “Nitrous”, Cicero has a similar floral profile, but is enhanced with a citrus garnish. While this blend features the same fragrant aromas of its venerable predecessor (namely honeysuckle, cherry blossom and hibiscus), Cicero also offers violet and jasmine. For further dimension still, we add a delicate spritz of juicy blood orange.

item.title: Nitrous
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A floral blend of honeysuckle with berry highlights.
item.content:encoded: This one-of-a-kind floral recipe features enough complexity and sophistication to puzzle, yet please, even the most curious of palates. On the inhale you’ll taste sweet and fragrant honeysuckle. While on the exhale, you’ll get strong notes of lavendar, hibiscus and cherry blossom. Throughout the experience you’ll also pick up on subtle notes of mixed berries.

item.title: Arctic Mist
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A Smooth Menthol fit for any menthol ex-smoker. Not overpowering like other menthol flavors.
item.content:encoded: Arctic Mist is a simple and delicate flavor. With a careful complement of cream, this blend will leave your palate feeling rejuvenated and inspired. A classic Smooth Menthol flavor for all menthol ex-smokers. Not overpowering like other menthol flavors.

item.title: Mint Dream
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded: This blend came to us in a vision. A mint chocolate masterpiece worthy of display at the Met.

item.title: Frost Fire
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: An assertive blend of spicy cinnamon and cool, refreshing mint.
item.content:encoded: Frost Fire is an invigorating blend of spicy, red-hot cinnamon and cool, refreshing menthol. The two are joined in a symbiotic symphony that is sure to intrigue the palate and tickle the tongue.
